Package Projects

Class Project

java.lang.Object
Projects.Project
public class Project extends Object
The Project class represents a housing project with various attributes and methods. It includes information about the project's name, neighbourhood, flats, application dates, visibility, and associated officers. The class also provides methods for filtering projects based on different criteria.
Since:
2025-04-23

  • Constructor Details

    • Project

      public Project(String name, String neighbourhood, String unitType1, Integer numUnitsType1, Integer priceType1, String unitType2, Integer numUnitsType2, Integer priceType2, LocalDate applicationOpenDate, LocalDate applicationCloseDate, boolean visibility, Users.Manager manager, Integer officerSlots, List<Users.Officer> officerList, List<Application> applicationList, List<Registration> registrationList, List<Enquiries.Enquiry> enquiryList)
      Constructor for the Project class.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the project.
      neighbourhood - The neighbourhood where the project is located.
      unitType1 - The type of the first unit (e.g., 2-room, 3-room).
      numUnitsType1 - The number of units of the first type.
      priceType1 - The selling price of the first type of unit.
      unitType2 - The type of the second unit (e.g., 4-room, 5-room).
      numUnitsType2 - The number of units of the second type.
      priceType2 - The selling price of the second type of unit.
      applicationOpenDate - The date when applications open.
      applicationCloseDate - The date when applications close.
      visibility - Indicates whether the project is visible to users.
      manager - The manager responsible for the project.
      officerSlots - The number of officer slots available for the project.
      officerList - List of officers associated with the project.
      applicationList - List of applications for the project.
      registrationList - List of registrations for the project.
      enquiryList - List of enquiries related to the project.

    • viewProjects

      public static List<Project> viewProjects(List<Project> allProjects, Users.User user)
      Filters the list of projects based on the user's access rights.
      Parameters:
      allProjects - The list of projects to filter.
      user - The user whose permissions are being checked.
      Returns:
      A list of projects that the user has permission to view.

    • filterProjectsByFlatType

      public static List<Project> filterProjectsByFlatType(List<Project> allProjects, String flatType)
      Filters the list of projects based on the flat type.
      Parameters:
      allProjects - The list of projects to filter.
      faltType - The flat type to filter by (e.g., 2-Room, 3-Room).
      Returns:
      A list of projects that the user has permission to view and are visible.

    • filterProjectsByNeighbourhood

      public static List<Project> filterProjectsByNeighbourhood(List<Project> allProjects, String neighbourhood)
      Filters the list of projects based on the neighbourhood.
      Parameters:
      allProjects - The list of projects to filter.
      neighbourhood - The neighbourhood to filter by.
      Returns:
      A list of projects that match the specified neighbourhood.

    • filterProjectsByPrice

      public static List<Project> filterProjectsByPrice(List<Project> allProjects, Integer minPrice, Integer maxPrice)
      Filters the list of projects based on the price range.
      Parameters:
      allProjects - The list of projects to filter.
      minPrice - The minimum price for the filter.
      maxPrice - The maximum price for the filter.
      Returns:
      A list of projects that match the specified price range.
